response.message: Fun time, can't wait for (someone else) to create visualizations.
I'd been planning on downloading the CC data eventually, but this allows me to be much lazier.  Thanks!

I’m currently working as a tutor/TA for database systems and such a database would indeed have been very helpful. We had to use the ineffably boring Mondial database. Now someone just has to port the schema and data to Postgres. ;-)

The readme.txt file states:

"The Data directory contains a blank schema for a "Stack" site and the schema for data explorer."

I cannot find the Data directory nor any such SQL. Any pointers?
Keep up the good work gratisinternet
